price: 30. Diríjanse hacia un humo que (se eleva y) se divide en tres ramificaciones,
arabic: ٱنطَلِقُوٓاْ إِلَىٰ ظِلّٖ ذِي ثَلَٰثِ شُعَبٖ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: inṭaliqū ilā ẓillin dhī thalāthi shuʿabin
